Application
Bits< N >::BitAccessAccess to one bit in Bits struct Provides access to one bit. Is used by the [] operator of Bits to modify bits
Bits< N >Bits Gives an easy-to-use interface vor bitwise operations on data. Example : union {Bits<8> bits; char byte;} mask; This will give you access to the bits of mask by e.g. mask.bits[2] and to the whole byte as char
